Subjects: agriculture; prayers, domestic; illustrations, verses accompanying
_description: A caption for a picture of a man ploughing (in one MS of Piers Plowman) — one couplet

CamCCC293.Transcription: God spede the plowghAnd send vs corne ynowgh
CamCCC293.Note:
On a slip of paper bound in before f. 1, possibly cut from a leaf that
                    originally had an illustration as Cambridge UK,  Trinity College R.3.14 (594).

CamTCC594.Transcription: God spede þe plouȝ& sende us korne i now
CamTCC594.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Catalogue of the
